body_html:
It's not clear to me which protobuf you want. There are several protobufs in conda, "conda search protobuf" to see them all for your current OS. Which protobuf do you want / need? Why can you not use the protobuf that comes with Caffe2 (by "comes with" I mean the protobuf that conda decides to ship with it)?

Do you mean that on a clean install of Caffe2 into a new conda environment that you are getting an error message about protobuf version mismatches?

body:
It's not clear to me which protobuf you want. There are several protobufs in conda, "conda search protobuf" to see them all for your current OS. Which protobuf do you want / need? Why can you not use the protobuf that comes with Caffe2 (by "comes with" I mean the protobuf that conda decides to ship with it)?

Do you mean that on a clean install of Caffe2 into a new conda environment that you are getting an error message about protobuf version mismatches?
